page.title: 14GOVERNMENT ASHBY M PEATLING
page.content:
The villages of Ashby Magna and Peatling Parva have their own Parish Councils. The Parish Council is a non-political body made up of elected parishoners. It is the voice of the village and presents the villagers point of view to the District Council at Market Harborough and the Leicestershire County Council at Glenfield. The Parish Councils belong to the Association of Parish Councils which will advise and help them on request.
The villages are in the Parlimentary constituency of Blaby and are represented at the present time by Nigel Lawson, the Chancellor of the Exchequer in the Conservative Government.
